headline: KKR to Present at the Morgan Stanley US Financials Conference 2025
summary: NEW YORK, June 02, 2025--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) announced today that Adam Smith, Partner and Co-Head of Credit & Markets, will present at the Morgan Stanley US Financials Conference 2025 on Tuesday, June 10, 2025 at 9:00 AM ET.

headline: KKRT: 6.875% Subordinated Note IPO From KKR & Co.
summary: KKRT offers a 6.875% nominal yield, a BBB+ rating, and is fairly priced relative to KKR's senior debt and sector peers. Read the full analysis here.

headline: Hamilton Lane: Q4 Results Fail To Justify Valuation Premium
summary: Hamilton Lane posts strong Q4 FY 2025 results but faces a share dip due to premium valuation. Click here to find out why I rate HLNE stock a hold.
